alert.note: Alert for Meeker; Sherburne; Stearns; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 12:10PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Wright, east central Meeker, western Sherburne and southeastern Stearns Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1210 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Annandale, or 16 miles west of Buffalo, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Annandale around 1220 PM CDT. Maple Lake around 1230 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Clearwater, Monticello, Clear Lake and Becker. This includes the following highways... Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 172 and 197. U.S. Highway 10 in Minnesota between mile markers 181 and 204. U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 113 and 119. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
